com.invoices.controller

Class PdfController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invoices.controller.PdfController

  • public class PdfController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller is responsible for generating a PDF representing the requested invoice. NOTE: If you need to store the pdf files locally, change the MACRO variable 'STORE_PDF_ON_SERVER' to True.
    Author:
    psoutzis

      void generatePdf(java.lang.String id, HttpServletResponse response)

    • Method Detail

      • generatePdf

        public void generatePdf(java.lang.String id,
                        HttpServletResponse response)
        Method will send the bytes of the newly created .pdf file to the browser, making it available for download. It will delete the file from local storage afterwards.
        Parameters:
        id - Is the primary key of the invoice to generate a PDF from.
        response - Is the HTTP response that will write the pdf bytes to the browser
